hero.discoverDestiny: Discover how your birth date and name influence your destiny
hero.discoverHidden: Discover the hidden meanings behind your numbers and how they influence every aspect of your life journey.
hero.numerologyDesc: Numerology is the mystical study of numbers and their influence on human life. Each number carries a unique vibration that can reveal insights about your personality, talents, obstacles, and opportunities.

services.servicesDescription: Explore our range of personalized numerology services designed to provide clarity, guidance, and insight into your life's journey.
services.birthMapDescription: Complete report with all your numbers based on the Seven Hermetic Principles, revealing energy patterns that influence your journey.
services.personalReadingDescription: A comprehensive analysis of your core numbers and how they influence your personality, strengths, challenges, and life path.
services.relationshipCompatibilityDescription: Discover how your numbers interact with your partner's and gain insights into the strengths and challenges of your relationship.
services.businessNumerologyDescription: Optimize your business decisions with numerological insights into timing, naming, and strategic planning.
services.customDescription: We offer tailored numerology services to address your specific questions and needs.
services.individualNumberAnalysis: Individual Number Analysis for Both Partners

footer.unlockingSecrets: Unlocking the secrets of numerology to guide you on your life's journey.
footer.newsletterDesc: Subscribe to our newsletter for numerology insights and special offers.

testimonials.testimonialsDescription: Discover how numerology readings have transformed the lives of people just like you.

qa.qaDescription: Find answers to common questions about our numerology services and the Birth Map.
qa.noQuestionsFound: No questions found matching your search.
qa.cantFindAnswer: If you couldn't find the answer you were looking for, feel free to contact us directly.

home.numerologyDesc: Numerology is the mystical study of numbers and their influence on human life. Each number carries a unique vibration that can reveal insights about your personality, talents, obstacles, and opportunities.
home.lifePathDescription: Discover your core purpose and the path you're meant to follow in this lifetime.
home.destinyDescription: Uncover the talents and abilities you possess to fulfill your life's mission.
home.soulUrgeDescription: Reveal your inner desires, motivations, and what truly makes your heart sing.
home.unlockHiddenMeanings: Unlock the hidden meanings behind your numbers and discover the path to your highest potential.

contactUs.contactDescription: Have questions about our numerology services? We're here to help. Reach out to us using any of the methods below.
contactUs.subject: Subject
contactUs.emailResponse: We respond to all messages within 24 hours.

birthMap.birthMapDescription: Complete report with all your numbers based on the Seven Hermetic Principles, revealing energy patterns that influence your journey.
birthMap.birthMapPageDescription: Discover the hidden patterns in your life with our comprehensive Birth Map analysis
birthMap.orderReceived: Your Birth Map order has been received and is being processed. We'll deliver your personalized Birth Map to
birthMap.deliveryTime: Usually within a couple of hours, but no later than 24 hours from now
birthMap.whatsIncluded: What's Included in Your Birth Map
birthMap.deliveryNotice: Your Birth Map will be delivered within a couple of hours after purchase
birthMap.motivationDesc: Represents your deepest desires, what drives you and makes you feel fulfilled.
birthMap.expressionDesc: Shows how you present yourself to the world and how people perceive you.
birthMap.birthDayDesc: The specific energy of your birth day, indicating natural talents and challenges.
birthMap.hiddenTalentDesc: Latent characteristics and abilities that can be developed between the ages of 20 and 30.
birthMap.conjugalDesc: The energy that governs your love relationships and how you deal with love.
birthMap.hiddenTendencyDesc: How you instinctively react to challenges and unforeseen events.
birthMap.destinyNumberDesc: Describes influences on personality, obstacles, and opportunities you will encounter throughout life.
birthMap.missionDesc: The greater purpose of your existence and the tasks and learnings you came to experience.
birthMap.karmicDesc: Skills and experiences that were neglected in past lives and that you need to develop in this incarnation.
birthMap.lifeCyclesDesc: The three major phases of your journey (Youth, Maturity, and Old Age), each with specific learnings and energies.
birthMap.decisiveMomentsDesc: Remarkable periods in your trajectory that bring significant changes and transformations.
birthMap.invertedTriangleDesc: Reveals challenging vibrational patterns, and how to deal with them to avoid energy blockages.
birthMap.personalYearsDesc: Annual energies that influence your life provided for the next 9 years.
birthMap.monthlyGuidanceDesc: Detailed energy direction for each month and day, with forecasts for 1 year.

about.aboutDescription: Dedicated to revealing the hidden patterns in your life through the ancient wisdom of numerology.
about.missionText1: At CosmicNumbers, we believe that understanding the numerical vibrations that influence your life can lead to greater self-awareness, better decision-making, and a more fulfilling existence.
about.missionText2: Our mission is to make the ancient wisdom of numerology accessible to everyone, providing insights that can help you navigate life's challenges and embrace your unique path.
about.approachText1: We combine traditional numerological principles with modern interpretations to deliver readings that are both profound and practical. Our analyses are based on the Seven Hermetic Principles described in The Kybalion, offering a comprehensive view of your numerological blueprint.
about.approachText2: Whether you're seeking clarity about your life purpose, relationship dynamics, or career path, our numerologists provide personalized insights to illuminate your journey.
about.certifiedDesc: Our team consists of experienced numerologists with years of practice and deep knowledge of numerological principles.
about.personalizedDesc: We believe in tailoring our readings to your unique situation, providing insights that are relevant to your specific life circumstances.
about.practicalDesc: Our readings go beyond theory to offer actionable insights that you can apply to enhance your life and overcome challenges.
about.journeyText: Whether you're new to numerology or have been exploring its wisdom for years, we invite you to discover the profound insights that your numbers hold.

booking.bookingDescription: Take the first step towards understanding your numerological blueprint and unlocking your potential.
booking.questionsPlaceholder: Is there anything specific you'd like us to address in your reading?
booking.bookingThankYou: Thank you for booking your numerology reading with us. We've sent a confirmation email with all the details to your inbox.
booking.birthMapPaymentThankYou: Thank you for purchasing your Birth Map. We've sent a confirmation email with all the payment details to your inbox.
booking.birthMapDelivery: Your Birth Map will be prepared and delivered to your email within 2 business days.
booking.numerologistContact: Our numerologist will contact you within 24 hours to schedule your session.

name.label: Full name
name.description: Attention: make sure you have written all the letters of your first and last name and accented them (if applicable) before submitting.

birthday.label: Date of birth
birthday.description: This field is required. Make sure to enter the date of birth exactly as it is registered on your birth certificate.

email.label: Email address
email.description: This email will be used to send your Birth Map.

phone.label: Phone number
phone.description: This number will be used to send your Birth Map.

partnerName.description: This name will be used to send your Birth Map.

partnerBirthday.label: Partner's Date of Birth
partnerBirthday.description: This field is required. Make sure to enter the date of birth exactly as it is registered on your birth certificate.
partnerBirthday.errorMessage: Partner's Date of Birth is required

businessName.label: Business Name
businessName.description: This name will be used to send your Birth Map.

businessType.label: Business Type
